Judge rejects home detention for Darren Couper, who kicked dying Auckland MMA instructor in head after stabbing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/judge-rejects-home-d-for-darren-couper-who-kicked-dying-auckland-mma-instructor-in-head-after-stabbing/ PXMK3ADJ4BBH7JKI55KQ4NAKSQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/judge-rejects-home-d-for-darren-couper-who-kicked-dying-auckland-mma-instructor-in-head-after-stabbing/ PXMK3ADJ4BBH7JKI55KQ4NAKSQ/ Craig KapitanKevin 'Honey Badger' Hay was a popular martial arts instructor with 70,000 followers. Photo / Michael Craig
